name: Slime Boi (noakishere)
description:
This game was made during Ludum Dare 47

A product of Brosdio

Programming/Music: 
Kamyar Karimi @noakishere

Art/Animation: 
Tu Ngoc Tri @tungoctri

How To Play?

You're obviously a slime...

What else is there to say?

Oh yeah.. 
PRESS SPACEBAR TO JUMP

Avoid the ROCKS

Try to not slide down... 
You'll get  C H O M P E D

Have Fun !
